data.actual_result: Mic shows unmuted instead of muted and headphones show muted instead of unmuted.
data.expected_result: If someone has mic muted, for example, when you enter the voice chat menu it should show that mic is muted but headphones are on.
data.short_description: Muted mic/headphones are changed between voice channels menu selection and the voice channel menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone in a voice chat - See if it has the mic/headphones muted - Enter the connect/disconect voice menu.
